name: Star Fall (ZePimpPotatoe)
description: Starfall is a 2D platformer where you control Tim,a friendly red square which is not able to move. Due to some "odd occurences", Tim saw a star falling towards him,to which he made a wish.To find all the answers regarding his creation.Luckily for him, the star that fell gave him the ability to move(but in one direction only). Collect all the fallen stars in order to help Tim discover the secrets about his own kind.
